#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#include <stdio.h>
using namespace std;
int a[10000010]={0};
int fastInput() {
    int val = 0;
    char c = getchar_unlocked();
    while (c<33) c = getchar_unlocked();
    while (c>33) val = (val<<1) + (val<<3) + (c-'0'), c = getchar_unlocked();
    return val;
}
int main()
{
	ios::sync_with_stdio(0);
	cin.tie(0);
	int t;
	t=fastInput();
	while (t--)
	{
		int n;
		int temp;
		n=fastInput();
		int arr[5010]={0};
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			arr[i]=fastInput();
			a[arr[i]]++;
		}
		long long ans=0;
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			if(a[arr[i]])
			{
				while(a[arr[i]]>0)
				{
					ans+=(arr[i]+1);
					a[arr[i]]-=(arr[i]+1);
				}
				a[arr[i]]=0;
			}
		}
		printf("%lld\n",ans);
	}
	return 0;
}
